import './ContactMe.css' import pikachu4 from '../../img/pikachu4.png' import {themeContext} from '../../Context' import {useContext} from 'react' export default function ContactMe() { const theme = useContext(themeContext) const darkMode = theme.state.darkMode; return (
Get in Touch Contact Me
) }
